pages.title: Beehive Oven Pit
pages.text: A large enclosed structure seems to work well for cooking my blocks over time. As long as the smoke can reach the sky and a solid floor around it, I'm happy...
Right click with a flint and steel to light $(br)Currently converts:   $(li)subbituminous coal --> coke   $(li)bituminous coal --> coke   $(li)limestone --> quicklime
